products.title: Garmin nuvi 50LM
products.description:
The Nuvi 50LM is an automotive GPS unit from Garmin that offers a step-up from the company's standard Nuvi 50 model. Available with US-only and full North American (US & Canada) map data, this model includes lifetime updates to ensure users are consistently provided with the most accurate and up-to-date information. Available up to 4 times a year, owners can log onto the Garmin website and update their device firmware via USB connectivity. This process also keeps track of over 8 million points of interest (POIs) that may be encountered along a given travel route, including gas stations, restaurants and entertainment locations. Turn-by-turn directions are displayed on the Nuvi's 5-inch touchscreen LCD display, which offers quick configuration of destination addresses and intuitive control of detouring and re-routing on the fly. The Junction View and Lane Assist functions help to increase navigational accuracy when nearing a capital city or other major metropolitan area, providing users with a simulated 3D view of their surrounds complete with off-ramps and exit signs. Under the instruction of virtual areas and spoken-word commands, drivers can complete lane changes in confidence with minimal confusion. 

Features

  • 5-inch full-color LCD touchscreen
  • Free lifetime map updates 
  • Available in two different mapping versions - US only or US and Canada
  • "Where Am I" emergency locator function 
  • Includes over 6-million POIs 
  • Spoken street names 
  • Lane Assist with Junction View 
  • Bult-in speed limit indicator

pros.text: Accurate maps with an easy to use interface
Multiple language selection on both interface text and voice direction
Excellent price point when you consider all the features
The audio is crisp and clear- It has plenty of volume capacity even when your air is on
Very easy to upload map updates

cons.text: Traffic alert doesn't really help that much since it's not that reliable
